ARABIC: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَٰهُ نُطْفَةً فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: then made him a drop in a secure receptacle;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then We placed him as a sperm in a firmly established lodging;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then We made him into a drop of life-germ, then We placed it in a safe depository,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: which was then turned into a living germ and placed in safe depository.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then made him a drop of fluid in a secure shelter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thereafter We made him a Nutfah in a safe lodging.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We made him a small seed in a firm resting-place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then We set him, a drop, in a receptacle secure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then placed him as a drop (of seed) in a safe lodging;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then We placed him as a drop of fluid in a safe place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thereafter We made him of a Sperm In a receptacle safe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We made him a drop of [seminal] fluid [lodged] in a secure abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then We placed him as (a drop of) sperm in a place of rest, firmly fixed;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thereafter We made him (the offspring of Adam) as a Nutfah (mixed drops of the male and female sexual discharge) (and lodged it) in a safe lodging (womb of the woman).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then We made him, a drop, in a secure receptacle (the womb).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then We made him a seed, in a secure repository.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:13] Then We made him, namely, man, the progeny of Adam, a drop, a sperm-drop, in a secure lodging, which is the womb.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then placed him as a drop (of seed) in a safe lodging) in the womb of his mother for forty days;
